short_description: Crafts professional and polished formal emails tailored to specific contexts and requirements.
description: This pattern assists in composing formal emails by understanding the context, purpose, and required tone. It generates well-structured, professional emails with appropriate greetings, clear introductions, detailed body content, and courteous closings. The pattern ensures adherence to business etiquette and professional writing standards.
usage_example: echo 'Write a formal email to schedule a meeting with a potential client' | fabric -p create_formal_email
